pageContext.claim: “In fact, out of many, many people, I was the only -- the one that wanted to do it. I guess I was the only one that mattered. But I kept China out of the United States [using a travel ban].”
pageContext.analysis: Trump, according to news reports, was initially skeptical and worried about provoking China after signing a major trade deal. But his national security and public health experts convinced him that the move would buy time to put in place effective prevention and testing measures.
